title: Associate Professor of Educational Technology
desc: Founder of the graduate program in edcuational technology at Adelphi University, where I teach courses in learning sciences, computer science, digital media studies, and multimedia design. Current research projects look at the politics of digital artifcats, especially learning technologies.

title: Graduate Research Assistant
desc: Designed research measures, gathered field data, employed quantiative and qualitative approaches to analyzes data, and provided design and technical support to faculty-led research projects.

title: Freelance Software Engineer
